reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress well-made, comfortable, and perfect for fall weddings and family photos, with one noting it hits just above the ankles. The dress receives positive feedback for its style, with one customer mentioning it's flattering for bustier women, and another noting it hides the stomach well. Customers appreciate the lovely material, with one describing it as flowy, and they love the color, with one hig

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and perfect for the season.
items.body: This is a beautiful, comfortable dress and was perfect for the wedding I attended. I love the color for Fall and the fit is perfect. It's long sleeved yet light weight so perfect for the season. Also, it has pockets which is awesome. I am delighted with this purchase. I liked this dress so much, I bought it in green for Christmas as well. Read more
items.author: AC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect find!!
items.body: This dress is true to size! I am 5 11 & around 206 pounds. I ordered an XL and it fit me perfectly. It was not too hot yet not too cool. Was perfect for that in between type weather. I received so many compliments on the dress. The quality of the dress is amazing! The green color was perfect shade of green & I was able to wash in my washing machine on cold without the color fading!! This dress is a must buy!! Read more
items.author: Danielle M Shepard

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprised and pleased with the look and feel
items.body: Ordered this for an upcoming fall wedding. I am 5 ft 4 inches tall and this is a perfect length for me as it hits just above my ankles. Won't have to worry about it dragging on the ground. Fabric is very comfortable and hopefully will travel well as i will need to pack it for several days on the way to the destination. When the dress arrived I did notice some creases in it once I removed it from the packaging, however, once I hung up the dress the creases have disappeared. Read more
items.author: Marcia Regan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's perfect, a real winner!
items.body: I knew this dress was the one even before I had it completely on my body! The waist smocking is perfectly placed to give a body hugging fit. The sleeves are the perfect length. The neckline is flattering but not too low. The length is perfect for me, just below mid calf. It's the perfect weight for fall and milder winter days. It's going to be so comfortable for the fall event I'm attending. The color seems to be a reasonable match for what I saw on my screen. I love the tone on tone effect and the texture of the fabric. Oh, I forgot to mention the pockets! They are well placed and deep enough to hold a tissue, chapstick or lipstick. This dress is a winner. It has me wondering, where have you been all my life?! Note on fit: Amazon suggested small, I ordered medium and it's a perfect fit. 135 lbs at 5'5" and 34 DD/DDD depending on bra brand. Busty ladies, I'd go one size up from Amazon's suggestion. Read more
items.author: LA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful fabric, well made
items.body: Simply gorgeous. Well made fits like a charm. Can go casual cruise type dress or add some bold jewelry and go full boho dressy. Very nice. No slip needed, fabric thicker and is beautiful. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress!
items.body: This is a beautiful dress-the color is gorgeous and it was so comfortable and perfect for our cruise. I was recommended to buy a medium but I got a small and it fit great. I typically am cold in the ship’s restaurants, but this had a good weight and I didn’t have to worry about a jacket. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkle easy
items.body: Dress looked good but not for my shape. I gave it to my daughter. Read more
items.author: Rosco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress ❤️
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Got this for a winter barn wedding this year. The dress fit like a dream. I am 38B bra, Top L and bottoms XL and I am 5'7". The dress hit mid calf. The sleeves weren't a weird length, they ended at my wrists. I don't have a big chest but this dress made me look good. There is an elastic band so there is room for a larger bosom. The quality is was good, no weird strings hanging off at the seams etc. I was comfortable the whole night and the length helped me not freeze. Read more
items.author: EmilyRead

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Burgundy, Sage Green, Black, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Orange, Rust Pink, Lake Blue, Beige, Teal, Chocolate Brown, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
